name: 'GMS2JAM'
description:
The game I rushed for the GameMaker Studio 2 - Beta Jam.

GameMaker Studio 2 sure is fun and easy to use BUT it won't make you a great artist -- so sorry about that part. I did the 'art' things. I tried to use tiles and cameras as these are newer elements of Studio 2.

The game itself is just a 'stay alive - shot badthings - collect ammo' because I am creatively bad & shooty-video-games.

For the sound; I used this pretty rad tool: http://sfbgames.com/chiptone/
